original_text: And when the sons of the prophets which were to view at Jericho saw him, they said, The spirit of Elijah doth rest on Elisha. And they came to meet him, and bowed themselves to the ground before him.
korean_text: 맞은편 여리고에 있는 선지자의 제자들이 그를 보며 말하기를 엘리야의 성령이 하시는 역사가 엘리사 위에 머물렀다 하고 가서 그에게로 나아가 땅에 엎드려 그에게 경배하고

sentences.original_text: which were to view at Jericho
The spirit of Elijah doth rest on Elisha
And they came to meet him
and bowed themselves to the ground before him
